name: fhe_http_web
description: ## Introduce - This package utilizes the **js-on-wasm-api** module from tfhe-rs to provide a JavaScript interface for web browsers, enabling communication with **fhe_http_js** running on `Node.js`. This service allows frontend users to securely outsource tasks within the ciphertext space. - This package is only for client side, so the operations on ciphertext space is not allowed.  - Reminder:    - This package can only be run in web browsers.   - GPU acceleration is not available in this project.
